    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphicLifeCounter

        public GraphicLifeCounter​(danogl.util.Vector2 widgetTopLeftCorner,
                          danogl.util.Vector2 widgetDimensions,
                          danogl.util.Counter livesCounter,
                          danogl.gui.rendering.Renderable widgetRenderable,
                          danogl.collisions.GameObjectCollection gameObjectsCollection,
                          int numOfLives)
        This is the constructor for the graphic lives counter. It creates a 0x0 sized object (to be able to call its update method in game), Creates numOfLives hearts, and adds them to the game.
        Parameters:
        widgetTopLeftCorner - the top left corner of the left most heart
        widgetDimensions - the dimension of each heart
        livesCounter - the counter which holds current lives count
        widgetRenderable - the image renderable of the hearts
        gameObjectsCollection - the collection of all game objects currently in the game
        numOfLives - number of current lives

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update​(float deltaTime)
        This method is overwritten from GameObject It removes hearts from the screen if there are more hearts than there are lives left
        Overrides:
        update in class danogl.GameObject
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - unused
